TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_langalj, title = langalj, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/langalj} }

S.FORM: aicu a langalj, kasiv sa kasengesengi a seman siteketekel a meseljang nua marusa, sakaki matjelu a caucau. aicu a langalj izua vincikan a pakialalang tua mudingan nua caucau, izua vincikan a pakialalang tua sacemel, izua langalj a vincikan a pakialalang tua qatjuvi a kamavanan uta. masikan a mayatucu a pakialalang tua langalj.na masan lialiaw sinanayan a langalj nua Paiwan: izua karutailj a langalj katua kalutjelu a langalj. kaizuazua karutailj a langalj aicu a karutailj a langalj, mavan a langalj nua mamazangiljan nu maqacuvung tua sikapalisian a qadaw nua qinaljanan. kaljutjelu a langalj nu tjezua tua sikapalisian a qadaw nua qinaljanan, aicu a kaljutjelu a langalj siteketekel nu maqacuvung a ljavaran tua rivurivuan niamadju saka marasudj tu uri na marepazekazekatjanga, uri na masaseljenguanguaqanga a varung niamadju a mamaw. pinudrusan tua ljui a langalj aicu a pinudrusan tua ljui a langalj, na masan lialiaw a patarevan. aicu a sangasangasan, avan nu patjezua ta na masan pazangal a qadaw. namaya tua Masalut, langalj asitekelj nua na palisi a mareka pulingaw. a ita kinateveteveljan nua taqaljaqaljan, langalj uta tjasikitekelan tua na mapaqaljay a caucau i qinaljan, tua mareka tja qali, katua mareka tja qaljaqalja. aicu asikamasanmusalj, avan nu maaeces a madrusa, inika palaing tu uqaljai tu vavayan. langalj a sitekel niamadju a kipakeljang tua kina mareqaliqan, kina maredravan niamadju. aicu a sikamasantjelulj, avan a ita papucekecekelj nua mamazagiljan. nu tazua nga qadaw, aicu a sinikaiyumaq nua taqaljaqaljan a vavayan katua uqaljai, matatekel tua linangalj a vava a maaeces tua parekatenglay nimadju,tu uri napalalaut a marekiljivak tiamadju. inika amin tiamadju a marusa amatatekel, aicu a matjaljaljak niamadju, katua mareka mamazangiljan akiseljavak, namayauta a lemangalj a matakel tua vava, a kipakeljang tu namasan ta cekeljan anga, uri palalaut anga parekiljivaljivak niamadju. tucu tucu a ziday maljian anga tja sivaivaik, na matjatju ljuiljui anga itjen, namatjatju senasenay ang itjen. meparutanga ravac atja kineljangan tua pacugan nua sikitekelan a pakatua langalj.,ljakua nu tjzua tua maljeveq, tua masalut katua pucekecekelj, mapacu anan tua matateketekel a pakatua langalj. nukaki makaya tja pasusuan a matatekel a pakata langalj izuaita pucekecekelj i kiukai, uri nanguaq aravac. qaqetitan aicu a langalj avan a sitekel nua qaqetitan. paljaqic aicu a paljaqic avan a kakasengsengan a semane lingadja katua langalj. pacunu uta kacalisian djilung

aico a langalj, kasiv sa kasengesengi a seman siteketekel a meseljang noa marosa, sakaki matjelo a caocao. aico a langalj izoa vincikan a pakialalang toa modingan noa caocao, izoa vincikan a pakialalang toa sacemel, izoa langalj a vincikan a pakialalang toa qatjovi a kamavanan ota. masikan a mayatoco a pakialalang toa langalj.na masan lialiaw sinanayan a langalj noa Paiwan: izoa karotailj a langalj katoa kalotjelo a langalj. kaizoazoa karotailj a langalj aico a karotailj a langalj, mavan a langalj noa mamazangiljan no maqacovong toa sikapalisian a qadaw noa qinaljanan. kaljotjelo a langalj no tjezoa toa sikapalisian a qadaw noa qinaljanan, aico a kaljotjelo a langalj siteketekel no maqacovong a ljavaran toa rivorivoan niamadjo saka marasodj to ori na marepazekazekatjanga, ori na masaseljengoangoaqanga a varong niamadjo a mamaw. pinodrosan toa ljoi a langalj aico a pinodrosan toa ljoi a langalj, na masan lialiaw a patarevan. aico a sangasangasan, avan no patjezoa ta na masan pazangal a qadaw. namaya toa Masalot, langalj asitekelj noa na palisi a mareka polingaw. a ita kinateveteveljan noa taqaljaqaljan, langalj ota tjasikitekelan toa na mapaqaljay a caocao i qinaljan, toa mareka tja qali, katoa mareka tja qaljaqalja. aico asikamasanmosalj, avan no maaeces a madrosa, inika palaing to oqaljai to vavayan. langalj a sitekel niamadjo a kipakeljang toa kina mareqaliqan, kina maredravan niamadjo. aico a sikamasantjelolj, avan a ita papocekecekelj noa mamazagiljan. no tazoa nga qadaw, aico a sinikaiyomaq noa taqaljaqaljan a vavayan katoa oqaljai, matatekel toa linangalj a vava a maaeces toa parekatenglay nimadjo,to ori napalalaot a marekiljivak tiamadjo. inika amin tiamadjo a marosa amatatekel, aico a matjaljaljak niamadjo, katoa mareka mamazangiljan akiseljavak, namayaota a lemangalj a matakel toa vava, a kipakeljang to namasan ta cekeljan anga, ori palalaot anga parekiljivaljivak niamadjo. toco toco a ziday maljian anga tja sivaivaik, na matjatjo ljoiljoi anga itjen, namatjatjo senasenay ang itjen. meparotanga ravac atja kineljangan toa pacogan noa sikitekelan a pakatoa langalj.,ljakoa no tjzoa toa maljeveq, toa masalot katoa pocekecekelj, mapaco anan toa matateketekel a pakatoa langalj. nokaki makaya tja pasosoan a matatekel a pakata langalj izoaita pocekecekelj i kiokai, ori nangoaq aravac. qaqetitan aico a langalj avan a sitekel noa qaqetitan. paljaqic aico a paljaqic avan a kakasengsengan a semane lingadja katoa langalj. pacono ota kacalisian djilong
